heading: Battery Telematics
content: We provide cutting-edge, open source telematics stack to optimize battery performance, safety, and longevity. Some of the advantages are White-labeled Telematics solutions, Battery Health Monitoring System, Battery Life Prediction, Battery Safety Monitoring, Integrations with Data Analytics Platforms, Remote Battery Diagnostics.

heading: Renewable Energy
content: Cellerite offers end-to-end services for renewable energy by integrating business extension services and telematics solutions tailored for solar and renewable energy providers.

heading: Embedded Systems and IoT
content: Cellerite offers end-to-end software services to develop custom BMS (Battery Management Systems) and connected application development.

heading: Battery Designs
content: Cellerite offers designing custom battery solutions for variety of applications. It includes CAD services, custom BMS development and testingÂ services.
